articles.title: This Dinosaur Found in Chile Had a Battle Ax for a Tail - The New York Times
articles.description: While ankylosaurs are already known for their armor and club tails, this specimen from South America had a unique way of fighting predators.
articles.content: In life, Stegouros would have been about six feet long, with a proportionally large head, slender limbs and a strange short tail, tipped with seven pairs of flattened, bony osteoderms that form a sin… [+1316 chars]
